parameters.name: filter
parameters.description: Filter criteria limits the authentication policy contracts that are returned to only those that match it. The filter criteria is compared to the authentication policy contract name and ID fields. The comparison is a case-insensitive partial match. No additional pattern based matching is supported.

responseMessages.message: PingFederate does not have the appropriate IdP/SP role enabled. Operation not available.

operations.summary: Create a new Authentication Policy Contract.
operations.notes: Create a new Authentication Policy Contract. If the Authentication Policy Contract is not properly configured, a 422 status code is returned along with a list of validation errors that must be corrected.

responseMessages.message: The request was improperly formatted or contained invalid fields.
PingFederate does not have the appropriate IdP/SP role enabled. Operation not available.

operations.summary: Gets the Authentication Policy Contract by ID.
operations.notes: Get an Authentication Policy Contract with the specified ID. A 404 status code is returned for nonexistent IDs

responseMessages.message: PingFederate does not have the appropriate IdP/SP role enabled. Operation not available.

operations.summary: Update an Authentication Policy Contract by ID.
operations.notes: Update an Authentication Policy Contract with the specified ID. A 404 status code is returned for nonexistent IDs.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the Authentication Policy Contract to update.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Configuration for updated Authentication Policy Contract.

responseMessages.message: The request was improperly formatted or contained invalid fields.
PingFederate does not have the appropriate IdP/SP role enabled. Operation not available.

operations.notes: Delete an Authentication Policy Contract with the specified ID. A 404 status code is returned for nonexistent IDs. Note: If the request succeeds, the response body is empty. If the request fails, an ApiResult is returned with details of the error.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of Authentication Policy Contract to delete.

responseMessages.message: PingFederate does not have the appropriate IdP/SP role enabled. Operation not available.
Resource is in use and cannot be deleted.

AuthenticationPolicyContract.description: Authentication Policy Contracts carry user attributes from the identity provider to the service provider.

id.description: The persistent, unique ID for the authentication policy contract. It can be any combination of [a-zA-Z0-9._-]. This property is system-assigned if not specified.

name.description: The Authentication Policy Contract Name. Name is unique.

coreAttributes.description: A list of read-only assertion attributes (for example, subject) that are automatically populated by PingFederate.

extendedAttributes.description: A list of additional attributes as needed.

AuthenticationPolicyContractAttribute.description: An attribute for the Authentication Policy Contract.

AuthenticationPolicyContracts.description: A collection of Authentication Policy Contracts

items.description: The actual list of Authentication Policy Contracts.

fieldPath.description: The path to the model field to which the error relates, if one exists.

ApiResult.description: Details on the result of the operation.

validationErrors.description: List of validation errors, if any.
